meanings.definition: A person who practices or advocates for hygiene.
meanings.sent1: The hygieists at the hospital always make sure everything is clean and sanitized.
meanings.sent2: The hygieists in the community educate others on the importance of washing hands.
meanings.sent3: The hygieists joked that they could spot a dirty surface from a mile away.
meanings.sent4: She was a hygieist, seeing germs as invisible enemies to be defeated.
meanings.sent5: The group of hygieists worked tirelessly to keep the environment germ-free.
